data.name: Varjager
data.des: A ragtag armed group that fights like a disorganized mob, but can perform exceptionally well when led by a commander.

data.name: ELID
data.des: The Infected lack teamwork and do not consider the impact of their AoE skills on allies when using them. Additionally, most Infected possess extraordinary regeneration abilities.

data.name: Private Military Contractor
data.des: The Sangvis Ferri units are equipped with random enhancement modules at the start of the battle.

data.name: Paradeus
data.des: "502 Bad Gateway" refers to an error on the gateway or an invalid gateway, indicating a network error on the Internet. This error typically appears as a webpage feedback in web browsers. It does not necessarily mean the upstream server is down (no response from the gateway/proxy); rather, it indicates that the upstream server and gateway/proxy are exchanging data using different protocols.

data.name: The Third-Gen Dolls of the Conglomerate
data.des: The Third-Gen Dolls of the Conglomerate
